item.title: Read data with multiple header rows into R
item.description: A shorter version of this blog post now appears as an article vignette for the readxl package, thank you to Jenny Bryan for the invitation! A problem I run up against a lot when working with other peopleâ€™s data is having multiple header rows in the source data file. I like to use readr functions to read in rectangular data like .csv and .tsv files, but if you skip rows at import using the skip argument, you lose the header row as well, which usually has column names.
